name: Tyrvaya
indications: tyrvaya ( varenicline solution ) nasal spray indicated treatment signs symptoms dry eye disease .
contraindications: • one spray nostril twice daily ( approximately 12 hours apart ) . ( 2.1 ) • prime seven ( 7 ) actuations initial . re-prime 1 actuation used five ( 5 ) days . ( 2.2 )
warningsAndPrecautions: tyrvaya ( varenicline solution ) nasal spray available carton containing two ( 2 ) nasal spray amber glass type bottles . bottle consists white nasal pump blue dust cover , delivering 0.03 mg varenicline per spray ( 0.05 ml ) . bottle delivers one spray nostril twice daily 15 days . two nasal spray bottles carton , containing 60 sprays per bottle , equivalent 30-days ’ supply one spray nostril twice daily ( ndc 73521-030-02 ) .
indications_original: TYRVAYA (varenicline solution) nasal spray is indicated for the treatment of the signs and symptoms of dry eye disease.
contraindications_original: • One spray in each nostril twice daily (approximately 12 hours apart). ( 2.1 ) • Prime with seven (7) actuations before initial use.  Re-prime with 1 actuation if not used for more than five (5) days. ( 2.2 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
TYRVAYA (varenicline solution) nasal spray is available in a carton containing two (2) nasal spray amber glass Type I bottles.  Each bottle consists of a white nasal pump and blue dust cover, delivering 0.03 mg varenicline per spray (0.05 mL).  Each bottle delivers one spray in each nostril twice daily for 15 days.  
                        Two nasal spray bottles in each carton, containing 60 sprays per bottle, equivalent to 30-days’ supply with one spray in each nostril twice daily (NDC 73521-030-02).
